  Item 8.01.  Other Events.  
                             
On May 14, 2025, Wells Fargo & Company (the “Company”) issued a 
press release announcing it will redeem on June 15, 2025 (which,
due to the occurrence of a non-businessday, will shift to June  
16, 2025, the “Redemption Date”) all 80,000 outstanding shares  
of its 5.875% Fixed-to-FloatingRate Non-CumulativePerpetual     
Class A Preferred Stock, Series U (the “Series U Preferred      
Stock”) and all outstanding shares of the related depositary    
shares, each representing a 1/25 thinterest in a share of the   
Series U Preferred Stock (the “Series U Depositary Shares”).    
After giving effect to the redemption on the Redemption Date, no
shares of the Series U Preferred Stock or the Series U          
Depositary Shares will remain outstanding.
